channel.title: God Save The Queen on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in God Save The Queen on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: A Message from John Cleese to the Citizens of the US
item.description: I saw this somewhere on the internet and found it hilarious. I apologise to any US citizen if he/she is offended but this is really good! To The citizens of the United States of America : In light of your failure to nominate competent candidates for President of the USA and thus to govern yourselves, we hereby give notice of the revocation of your independence, effective immediately.
